name: Shadow's Reach
description:
Shadow's Reach is a text-based casual game built with enthusiasm and Unity. 

It won't take long to complete but will try to prevent you from doing so.

You find yourself in a bright windowless room, the light above you showers down a heavy glow. There is a door with no handles or locks…

Escape the room and live to die another day.

  • Explore your surroundings,
  • search for clues,
  • gather items,
  • and don’t die.

Author

  • Nathan Shepherd
  • Cape Town, South Africa
  • Completed Feb 2018
